item.title: Minimizing the runtime of a SQL DAG
item.author: maxhalford25@gmail.com (Max Halford)
item.description: I recently looked into reducing the runtime of Carbonfact’s SQL DAG. Our DAG is made up of roughly 160 SQL queries. It takes about 10 minutes to run with BigQuery, using on-demand pricing. It’s decent. However, the results of our DAG feed customer dashboards, and we have the (bad) habit of refreshing the DAG several times a day. Reducing the runtime by a few minutes can be a nice quality-of-life improvement.
